bio.paragraph1: Hello, my name is Alexander, a passionate photographer, student and a coder in grade 7 who enjoys capturing memorable and compelling moments.
bio.paragraph2: I like experimenting with different perspectives, composition and light, turning everyday scenes into visually appealing photographs.
bio.paragraph3: In my spare time, I practice for my next image and try to stay in the moment - in school, real life or through a lens.

softSkills.title: Problem Solving
softSkills.description: Breaking down complex problems into manageable pieces and finding creative solutions.

softSkills.title: Attention to Detail
softSkills.description: Obsessed with pixel-perfect designs and clean, readable code.

softSkills.title: Self-Learning
softSkills.description: Constantly exploring new technologies, frameworks, and techniques independently.

softSkills.title: Human-Centered Design
softSkills.description: Trained in empathy-driven design thinking to create user-focused solutions.

interests.title: Photography
interests.description: Street photography, portraits, landscapes, and experimental composition. Always looking for unique perspectives and compelling moments.

interests.title: Coding
interests.description: Building web applications, learning new frameworks, and creating tools that solve real problems. Passionate about clean, minimal design.

interests.title: Learning
interests.description: Currently exploring human-centered design, web development best practices, and advanced photography techniques.

interests.title: Creating
interests.description: Love building projects from scratch - whether it's a portfolio, a photo series, or a new web app. Always making something.

currently: Building this portfolio and learning React
Grade 7 student, balancing school and creative projects
Open to collaboration on photography or code projects

awards.title: The Field Guide to Human-Centered Design
awards.description: Completed comprehensive training in human-centered design principles, focusing on empathy, ideation, and iteration in the design process.

contact.message: Interested in collaboration on photography or code? Reach out anytime.
